nodes.text: A Herglic was among a group of five hulking aliens that were captured by Trandoshan slavers on behalf of the Xonti Brothers, who wanted to turn the strongest among them into a ultraheavy enhanced gladiator. That Herglic was the last to be culled during the Brothers' deadly "training sessions", leaving only the Wookiee Black Krrsantan and a Dowutin.
